languages.text: [Включить вокс-связь со всеми палубами] "Экипаж, говорит Лорд-капитан. Я собираюсь повести корабль в неизвестность, навстречу опасности и славе. Вы со мной?"
[Switch on vox-communication with all decks] "Crew, this is the Lord Captain speaking. I am taking the ship into the unknown, where danger lies and glory awaits. Are you with me?"
languages.original_text: [Включить вокс-связь со всеми палубами] "Экипаж, говорит Лорд-капитан. Я собираюсь повести корабль в неизвестность, навстречу опасности и славе. Вы со мной?"

traits.locale_text: [Enable vox-communication with all decks] "Crew, this is Lord Captain. I am going to direct the ship to the unknown, danger, and glory. Are you with me?"
[Enable vox-communication with all decks] "Crew, this is Lord Captain. I am going to direct the ship to the unknown, danger, and glory. Are you with me?"
[Enable vox-communication with all decks] "Crew, this is Lord Captain speaking. I am going to helm the ship into the unknown where danger and glory lies ahead. Are you with me?"
[Enable vox-communication with all decks] "Crew, this is Lord Captain speaking. I am going to helm the ship into the unknown where danger and glory lies ahead. Are you with me?"
[Switch on vox-communication with all decks] "Crew, this is the Lord Captain speaking. I am taking the ship into the unknown, where danger lies and glory awaits. Are you with me?"

languages.text: [打开音阵频道，向所有甲板通话]“全体船员注意，这里是领主舰长。我要命令这艘船驶向未知的群星，那里既有危险，也有荣耀。你们愿意追随我吗？”
languages.original_text: [Switch on vox-communication with all decks] "Crew, this is the Lord Captain speaking. I am taking the ship into the unknown, where danger lies and glory awaits. Are you with me?"

traits.locale_text: [打开音阵频道，向所有甲板通话]“全体船员注意，这里是领主舰长。我要命令这艘船驶向未知的群星，那里既有危险，也有荣耀。你们愿意追随我吗？”

languages.text: [Activer la communication-vox sur l'ensemble des ponts du vaisseau] « À tous les membres d'équipage, ici votre {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je m'apprête à diriger ce vaisseau vers l'inconnu, où nous attendent aussi bien le danger que la gloire. Êtes-vous avec moi ? »
languages.original_text: [Switch on vox-communication with all decks] "Crew, this is the Lord Captain speaking. I am taking the ship into the unknown, where danger lies and glory awaits. Are you with me?"

traits.locale_text: [Activer la communication-vox sur l'ensemble des ponts du vaisseau] « À tous les membres d'équipage, ici votre {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je m'apprête à diriger ce vaisseau vers l'inconnu, où nous attendent aussi bien le danger que la gloire. Êtes-vous avec moi ? »

languages.text: [Voxkommunikation mit allen Decks aktivieren] "Crew, hier spricht der Lord Captain. Ich werde mit dem Schiff ins Unbekannte vorstoßen, wo uns Gefahren und Ruhm erwarten. Seid Ihr an meiner Seite?"
languages.original_text: [Switch on vox-communication with all decks] "Crew, this is the Lord Captain speaking. I am taking the ship into the unknown, where danger lies and glory awaits. Are you with me?"

traits.locale_text: [Voxkommunikation mit allen Decks aktivieren] "Crew, hier spricht der Lord Captain. Ich werde mit dem Schiff ins Unbekannte vorstoßen, wo uns Gefahren und Ruhm erwarten. Seid Ihr an meiner Seite?"

languages.text: [Habilitar la comunicación por voco con todas las cubiertas] «Personal de la nave, al habla {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán. La nave se dirige hacia lugares desconocidos donde nos esperan peligros, pero también la gloria. ¿Me acompañarán en esta empresa?».
languages.original_text: [Switch on vox-communication with all decks] "Crew, this is the Lord Captain speaking. I am taking the ship into the unknown, where danger lies and glory awaits. Are you with me?"

traits.locale_text: [Habilitar la comunicación por voco con todas las cubiertas] «Personal de la nave, al habla {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán. La nave se dirige hacia lugares desconocidos donde nos esperan peligros, pero también la gloria. ¿Me acompañarán en esta empresa?».

languages.text: [全デッキとのヴォクス通信を起動]「乗組員諸君、こちらはロード・キャプテンである。これより我々は危険が潜み、栄光が待つ未知の領域へと船を進める。ついてきてくれるか？」
languages.original_text: [Switch on vox-communication with all decks] "Crew, this is the Lord Captain speaking. I am taking the ship into the unknown, where danger lies and glory awaits. Are you with me?"

traits.locale_text: [全デッキとのヴォクス通信を起動]「乗組員諸君、こちらはロード・キャプテンである。これより我々は危険が潜み、栄光が待つ未知の領域へと船を進める。ついてきてくれるか？」

languages.text: [Tüm güvertelerle voks iletişimini başlat] "Mürettebat, Lord Kaptan konuşuyor. Gemimizi gaibe, tehlikenin ve şanın bizi beklediği bir yere götürüyorum. Yanımda mısınız?"
languages.original_text: [Switch on vox-communication with all decks] "Crew, this is the Lord Captain speaking. I am taking the ship into the unknown, where danger lies and glory awaits. Are you with me?"
